p: The use of Cannabis sp. and Cannabis-derived products is increasing globally. Concurrently, scientific interest has grown with cannabidiol (CBD)—related citations in PubMed increasing from 40 in 2000–2002 to 458 in 2014–2016 [ 1]. In North America and Europe, many countries have passed legislation permitting the medicinal use of certain cannabis-derived products in humans, and some countries have passed laws permitting recreational use.
